plurals.name: ioa_misc_autounlink_message_format
plurals.item: This authenticator has been disabled and unlinked because %1$d attempt to verify this authentication method failed.
This authenticator has been disabled and unlinked because %1$d consecutive attempts to verify this authentication method have failed.

plurals.name: ioa_sec_geo_add_error_invalidname_message_format
plurals.item: Please choose a name for this location that is at least %1$d character in length.
Please choose a name for this location that is at least %1$d characters in length.

plurals.name: ioa_sec_bp_add_error_invalidname_message_format
plurals.item: The Wearable name must be at least %1$d character. Please modify the name, and then try again.
The Wearable name must be at least %1$d characters. Please modify the name, and then try again.

plurals.name: ioa_ar_error_result_poli_amount_message_format
plurals.item: To authorize this request in the future, this authenticator must have at least %1$d additional method of authentication enabled.
To authorize this request in the future, this authenticator must have at least %1$d additional methods of authentication enabled.

plurals.name: ioa_misc_autounlink_warning_message_format
plurals.item: Failing this authentication method once more will disable and unlink this authenticator.
Failing this authentication method %1$d more consecutive times will disable and unlink this authenticator.
